class.name: BTForEach
class.brief_description: BT decorator that executes child for each element of an [Array].
class.description: BT decorator that executes child for each element of an [Array]. On each iteration an element is saved to a [Blackboard] variable.

members.member: An [Array] stored in the [Blackboard] to iterate over.
[Blackboard] variable to store an element of array, referenced by [member array_var].
